website_summaries.verdict: A custom-made cover with commercial-grade materials for maximum durability and energy efficiency.
pros: Features virgin EPS insulation foam for effective heat retention
Can help save up to $80/year on energy costs
Comes with a five-year warranty and a 100% satisfaction guarantee
cons: Some buyers find the cover fits too loosely

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover. The color is mahogany which is a good look. We purchased the heat seal and double wrapped core as add-ons. It has the 6" taper for any water run off. It fits a little bigger than I expected but nothing major. It does have some wrinkles in the top of the cover but that's also a minor issue. It looks great overall and I would not hesitate to order from My Spa Cover again.
customer_reviews.author: JAVALOVER

customer_reviews.title: Ordered, Recieved, installed - way better then the old one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it a little larger then I measured just in case but that was not necessary. I also ordered it with the maximum length for the skirt which works much better then what I had before. Before I had a problem with it bowing inward and the wind blowing it open. The longer skirt and thicker insulation has so far stood up to some very severe storms. The clips also work great and are easy to install and hold it down well. I shopped around before going with this company and I am glad I did. They are excellent and offer a great value as well. A rare combination!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO TO ORDER A REPLACEMENT COVER
customer_reviews.text: I would like to commend the very well spoken woman who took care of getting all the information about measurements & incidentals over the telephone. She was precise, accurate & easy to work with. We're pleased with the workmanship. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D. Vauthrin

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but delivery time is deciptive
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what I needed but I purchased this version because the delivery date was much sooner than the competitors. Turns out, the upfront promised delivery date was several weeks off. It wasn't until I sent in my specifications that I was provided the real estimated delivery date. For many this might not be an issue, but I was selling my house and needed the new cover in a few weeks. It took about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Quality spa cover -
customer_reviews.text: thicker and a little heaver than my original LA Spa cover. Won't blow off like my LA original cover plus it has snap/buckles to secure it. Fits better than the original cover. Bought gray so it won't fade in Phoenix heat. The only thing : when folded, it doesn't have a fabric/vinyl handle on the inside folded part. I like to pull it to center while I am in the spa. Then flip it closed after I exit the spa.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very satisfied! Several years ago I paid as much for much less. I’ll know more in the next 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.author: T.Grigs

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the customer service provided by myspacover. There was some issues with the initial purchase but they made sure everything was taken care of. The quality is as good as the original cover I had and I expect this will last another 10 years like the original did. If you keep your spa out in the sun, I advise getting an additional thin cheap cover (similar to your grill cover) to last much longer. There are a few options on amazon. But overall, this replacement cover is everything I hoped it would be and I absolutely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Fit our spa perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement cover for a worn out old one. So far we are very happy with this cover obviously it’s brand new. We plan to get a canvas cover for it in the hot Az. Summer. The delivery was excellent. Our drive is too steep for big trucks. I was gone when they delivered it but they put it right on the front door steps. It arrived a week earlier than was promised so that was good. The cover looks great on our spa. The quality is good for the money. Hopefully will look as good in a few years. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DRILLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit
customer_reviews.text: A bit cumbersome to order, but great product. Delivered to wrong address but well packed and undamaged. Great color, solid build, and perfect size. I will have to see how long it takes to get waterlogged- paid for the extra wrapping which hopefully helps. So far so good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: scott berman

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly on my Spa
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the skirt length is much longer than my previous cover. This skirt covers completely over the tub rim and keeps the tub temperature warmer and more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Easy to purchase- perfit fit
customer_reviews.text: MySpaCover was really easy to work with. They gave me all the tools to measure the tub. I second guessed my ability to take the measurements correctly and took them 4 times. After a few nail biting weeks waiting for the cover to arrive, it did and was a PERFECT fit. The quality is great, better than the cover I was replacing. There are a lot of color choices which I liked because I'm pretty particular. Great company, great customer service and excellent product! I would order from them again (hopefully no time soon!!)
customer_reviews.author: N. Bolding

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly and well made
customer_reviews.text: Your help in measuring it caused it to fit perfectly. Ordering it in Coastal Gray on our gray deck looks terrific! We get compliments constantly. But this color will not fade because it is a light shade. I would recommend you to anyone! So happy over it because I ordered from someone else last time, was too big, poorly made and faded quickly. Didn't last long! You did everything right! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hunter

customer_reviews.title: This is a legitimate company!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to order my new hot tub cover through Amazon, but after reading reviews about MySpaCover I decided to give it a try. The cost savings was over $300 vs. purchasing from my local hot tub dealer (where I purchased my tub). I was very concerned about the fit and made sure to follow their instructions when it came to measuring. I received the cover with no issues and it fits perfect! My wife and I even like it better than the one we got with our tub! Hopefully it lasts at least a few years. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It is very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made cover, good overhang flaps. Fits my cover lifter well and not a big deal to open or close. The color is pretty jazzy too. My only complaint....which may be my fault....is it is about 2 inches bigger than my old cover and so I have to adjust it after closing. I measured, but ....oh well. It's nice and will last for years. The hot tub stays hot. Pretty good deal, huh?
customer_reviews.author: Susie from FL

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement cover
customer_reviews.text: Helpful with placing order - sizing, color ,etc. Fit perfectly when it arrived. Color was a little different from picture, but not enough to be upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ballard

customer_reviews.title: With the correct measurements this will be the perfect cover for your spa !
customer_reviews.text: I’m completely pleased with this custom spa cover. It’s light weight yet provides perfect insulation. When we have a freeze the top has frost on it, indicating that the insulation is keeping the spa warm and no heat is escaping.
customer_reviews.author: Villa quatre saisons

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect, and the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.text: I received my cover today, a week earlier than expected, and it was perfect. Lightweight, and cut exactly as asked. The snaps with the locks were a nice touch. I will definitely be recommending to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: B Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Be patient it takes a while since it is made to your exact dimension.
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits perfectly, takes a long time to get the item but it seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I ordered mine with an extra inch for coverage. Fits great. Surprisingly light.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This hot tub cover provides a tight seal, is lighter and thicker than our original cover, and has superior build quality. Our original cover had a gap on the sides where the center fold was, allowing heat to escape in the winter. Extra padding and a longer skirt ensure this will not happen with a cover provided by MySpaCover. Very happy with this purchase, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Very happy with the quality and durability. Our hot tub is out side and we have had some strong storms and winds come through recently. The cover has held up and stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. You must carefully measure all dimensions for them and mark it on the form they email you.
customer_reviews.author: WildBill33

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fit - Better than the original cover!
customer_reviews.text: Although, due to COVID 19, this order took a bit longer than expected, The wait was worth it. The Spa Cover is made with quality materials and fits precisely to my spa. I recommend this company and the product to anyone and everyone who needs a spa cover replacement. Just perfect from start to finish!
customer_reviews.author: RicK K

customer_reviews.title: Delivery took quite a while
customer_reviews.text: The cover is well made, fits beautifully, and looks great, The only reason there are only 4 stars is the delivery process, I was advised the cover was shipped a month before it was even ready to be shipped. The delivery took several months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and obviously well-built. Delivery took a while and was delayed... But the company even credited us a little for that inconvenience. Great customer service! We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent company from start to finish. Beautiful cover, exact size. Thank you for making the process so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The ordering and delivery experience went really well. I worked directly with the company to customize my order. The product is as expected. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover
customer_reviews.text: Out standing quality and fit like a glove..... I would definitely buy this again.... It did take a couple months so be patient
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, built to the size i needed, customer service was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Greg Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product & customer service
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our new hot tub cover. Very good quality. Customer service was very helpful when I didn’t understand the instructions on how to order. Due to COVID-19 and their reduced work force, it did take 2 weeks longer than they stated. It was worth the wait. If needed, I would order from them again. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: wayback53

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My original detailed review was censored, so I'll just say it's good, hopefully that won't be rejected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harvey

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: It was made to order excpt the extra 2 straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: The cover came with the box very damaged but the packing material protected the cover well. It was made to my specifications and fits perfectly. Well worth the wait and the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pikamama

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The spa cover came sooner than promised, the fir and quality were good. All in all, just as expected. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: fromt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the new hot tub cover a few weeks, but we are very please with it. The construction seems very good and it fit perfectly. I like the design of the side flaps overlapping where the cover folds. It provides a much better seal from the elements than our old cover.
customer_reviews.author: kld

customer_reviews.title: Not fast
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for this item now for over 6 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Speedoman

customer_reviews.title: "CUSTOM FIT"
customer_reviews.text: The communication with this manufacturer/supplier is the best. Thanks to them, my replacement cover is better than the cover it came with.
customer_reviews.author: G.L. Baixauli

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with how well this cover fits. The product is well made and the quality of the spa cover material is very good. The company was easy to deal with: knowledgeable and helpful. Glad we ordered from them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Squires

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third cover I have bought for my hot tub and it fits a lot better than the others and “seals” itself to the tub so it uses a lot less energy to keep it warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Hafell

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get it, but not a priority shipping item during the covid situation. Just arrived. Easy to install. Great fit. Would recommend product
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Barry

customer_reviews.title: If availability order with adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.text: Straps are not adjustable that is a bit concerning. When screwing in new clips we made sure straps were as tight as possible. Otherwise it seems GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good cover
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cover but my tie down locks broke during this past storm and 1 of the straps broke. how can I get new strap locks.
customer_reviews.author: stacy G. King

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, fast and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good communication and fast delivery of this high end quality product. It exceed my expectations. Would definitely recommend. So happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy again. Very nice cover, well made hence the lead time which was completely fine!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McNeilly

customer_reviews.title: how it would fit....actually not great..id say just ok
customer_reviews.text: Color...Not as expected...much lighter than represented....Fit.. (flap around cover 1/2" shorter than ordered) not happy with purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Phil Gudelunas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: A feature that is better than previous covers is the split in the skirt at the corners. It allows more flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Best cover we have ever had. Very easy to deal with quality cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: High quality.. Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Equals or exceeds original cover. Measure carefully and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE BARSNESS

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for a better experience.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that I was a bit leary ordering something that was not returnable and based on my getting the measurements correct, but in the end everything was great. The company sent an email almost immediately which in itself was a surprise as I expected a day or two lag. The email contained everything I needed to measure and complete the order. Delivery was within the estimated time frame, and the spa cover is perfect. High quality, perfect fit, and I'd say better than the one that was delivered with the spa when new. I'll be ordering my next replacement from this company.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Daniels

product_meta.title: MySpaCover Hot Tub Cover and Spa Cover Replacement- 6 Inch Taper, Any Shape Any Size up to 96"
product_meta.description: All custom spa covers are made to order with the exact measurements provided to ensure a perfect fit. We utilize the highest quality marine grade vinyl and insulation that sets our covers apart in the industry. Additional product details: Any shape and size up to 96”x 96” 10 custom colors to choose from Every Seam Double Stitched for Maximum Durability 30oz Marine Grade Vinyl Free Upgraded Handles 5 year Warranty Largest Manufacturer in North America Free Freight Shipping in US 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Save Money on your electricity bill! Our Spa Covers are made with energy efficiency in mind. Replacing your hot tub cover can save up to $80 per year on your electricity bill! Over the course of the warranty our spa cover will pay for itself!
feature_bullets: Replace your spa cover with America’s Largest and most trusted Spa Cover Supplier. With our 100% satisfaction guarantee you can be confident in replacing your spa cover with MySpaCover.

All spa covers are custom made to order to ensure a perfect fit. We will custom make any shape and size up to 96x96 with 10 vibrant colors to choose from. After completing your purchase our team will be in touch to confirm shape, size, color, and skirt/strap length to ensure we make the perfect spa cover.

We use commercial grade material including 30oz marine grade vinyl and energy efficient virgin EPS insulation foam. All seems are double stitch all seems to ensure you get the longest life out of your spa cover.
MySpaCover makes the most energy efficient Spa Covers in the market. Our covers save customers up to $80/yr in energy savings.
All Spa Covers are covered by our industry leading 5 year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
